project_title: Use Social Media Trends data to tell a story
brief_description: Analyse social data, tell visual stories, and capture insights.
detailed_description: Analyze and visualize social media engagement data to uncover trending topics, audience preferences, and sentiment insights. Present findings using dashboards and storytelling techniques that make data engaging and easy to interpret.
core_features: Collect and organize social media data
Apply storytelling principles to data insights

project_title: Slice and dice data to support business
brief_description: Design, manage, and analyze patient data
detailed_description: Develop a relational database for hospital operations to manage patient records, appointments, staff details, and treatments. Use SQL queries and stored procedures to efficiently retrieve and analyze medical data.
core_features: Design ER diagrams for hospital workflows
Develop SQL queries and stored procedures
Generate analytical reports on patient and staff data

project_title: Show case and sharpen Python coding
brief_description: Build a smart finance tracker on daily expenses.
detailed_description: Develop a Python-based financial tracker that helps users record, categorize, and analyze expenses. Implement data structures and file handling to store and process financial data efficiently.
core_features: Add, update, and delete expense records
Store data persistently using file handling

project_title: Work like a Data Analyst on E-commerce Behavior
brief_description: Explore shopper patterns to uncover insights that drive sales.
detailed_description: Analyze e-commerce transaction data to identify patterns in user behavior, popular product categories, and conversion trends. Use Python and visualization tools to derive insights that support marketing strategies.
core_features: Perform exploratory data analysis with Pandas
Identify customer segments and sales drivers

project_title: Work like a BI Analyst on Sales and Revenue
brief_description: Turn business data into powerful, insight-rich dashboards.
detailed_description: Build interactive Power BI dashboards that visualize key sales and revenue metrics. Use Power Query and DAX to clean, transform, and model data for actionable business intelligence.
core_features: Integrate data from multiple business sources
Create KPIs and measures using DAX

project_title: Work like a Data Analyst to Predict Customer Churn
brief_description: Identify customers at risk of leaving and boost retention.
detailed_description: Analyze customer behavior data to predict churn using statistical and machine learning techniques. Apply hypothesis testing and inferential statistics to validate patterns and suggest retention strategies.
core_features: Perform statistical tests and correlation analysis
Build and evaluate churn prediction models

brief_description: Predict product demand to optimize stock and boost business efficiency.
detailed_description: Develop a complete analytics solution that combines data collection, cleaning, analysis, and machine learning to forecast product demand. Use Python, SQL, Power BI, and Excel for an integrated approach to business intelligence and predictive modeling.
core_features: Collect and integrate data from multiple business sources
Clean and preprocess sales and inventory data
Build machine learning models to forecast demand
Visualize predictions with Power BI dashboards
Use GenAI tools for report generation and insights

project_title: Build a Smart Pizza Ordering System
brief_description: Smart pizza ordering system powered by Java.
detailed_description: Create a user-friendly pizza ordering application using Java. The system guides customers through every stepâ€”from entering details to selecting pizzas, applying discounts, and viewing the final bill. It ensures smooth user experience and efficient backend processing.
core_features: Generate and display final bill summary

brief_description: Responsive restaurant website with modern design and flair.
detailed_description: Design and develop a responsive restaurant website that displays menus, contact information, timings, and reviews. Focus on mobile-friendly design and smooth navigation to provide an appealing digital presence for the restaurant.
core_features: Contact info and embedded Google Map

header: Web App using HTML, CSS & JS
project_title: Develop a Restaurant Order Management App
brief_description: Smart order processing platform for restaurants.
detailed_description: Build a robust order management web app that helps restaurant staff handle reservations and orders seamlessly. It streamlines workflows, reduces delays, and enhances customer service during busy hours.
core_features: Facilitate communication between staff and kitchen

brief_description: Automated grading and student record management system.
detailed_description: Develop a school management application that automates grading and record-keeping for students. The project simplifies administrative tasks, reduces manual errors, and enhances transparency in performance tracking.

brief_description: Streamlined course enrollment system for students.
detailed_description: Develop a course enrollment portal where students can browse, explore, and register for various educational programs. It provides a simple, user-friendly interface for both students and administrators.
core_features: Browse available courses with search and filters
Admin module to manage course catalog

project_title: Build a Personal Task Manager App
brief_description: Smart task management app for everyday productivity.
detailed_description: Create a lightweight task management tool that lets users plan, organize, and complete daily tasks efficiently. Designed with simplicity and productivity in mind, it helps users maintain focus and track progress effortlessly.
core_features: Add, edit, and delete tasks with due dates
Mark tasks as complete or pending
Categorize tasks by priority or type

project_title: Develop an Event Ticket Booking System
brief_description: Easy event ticket and food combo booking system.
detailed_description: Develop a web-based booking system for events and shows, where users can select tickets, add food combos, and check out seamlessly. The app ensures transparent billing, fast processing, and a delightful booking experience.
core_features: Add food combos to the booking

project_title: Build a Custom Cake Ordering Website
brief_description: Single-page website for custom cake orders.
detailed_description: Build a visually appealing, single-page application for a cake shop. Users can browse available cakes, submit custom cake requests, and explore reviewsâ€”all within a smooth and interactive user interface.

project_title: Build an Online Dairy Store Platform
brief_description: Single-page dairy store web app with cart and offers.
detailed_description: Design and implement a full-featured single-page web app for a dairy shop where users can browse products, add items to cart, and complete their orders. The app offers a seamless e-commerce experience with modern design and easy navigation.
core_features: Add to cart and secure checkout

brief_description: Comprehensive team planner and collaboration tool.
detailed_description: Build a collaborative productivity platform for individuals and teams. WorkWise allows users to manage projects, assign tasks, share updates, and visualize progress through a unified dashboard.
core_features: Collaborate through shared notes and files

project_title: Create a Smart Goal Tracking Application
brief_description: Personalized to-do and goal tracker with insights.
detailed_description: Design a personalized goal-tracking application that adapts to user habits and preferences. The system helps users organize their tasks, monitor progress visually, and stay on top of long-term goals.
core_features: Create and manage custom goal lists
Analytics and reports on task completion
